name: Why WestJet Leased Boeing 757s
description:
WestJet will be celebrating its 25th anniversary this year, and it's been interesting to watch them progress from 737-200s to 787-9s!

Before they committed to adding widebody aircraft to their fleet though, some might not know that they had actually leased some Boeing 757s.

This is the WestJet 757 story!

With thanks to @westjet  for the North American 757 photos.
